typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256) pure returns (struct Mayor.Return_coalition memory[] memory)

params._envelope: The envelope represented as the keccak256 hash of (sigil, doblon, soul)

params._sigil: (uint) The secret sigil of a voter
params._soul: (uint) The soul associated to the vote

params._candidates: (address) The address of the mayor candidate and optionally also the coaliton's address
params._escrow: (address) The address of the escrow account
params._quorum: (address) The number of voters required to finalize the confirmation

open_envelope(uint256,address).details: The soul is sent as cryptoNeed to recompute the hash to validate the envelope previously casted
